messages.subject: NSR - Dragonfly coin
messages.msgSnippet: I forget which one of us is the dragonfly enthusiast, but I figured I would share this link from the Canadian mint, in case he is interested. They charge way
messages.messageBody:
I forget which one of us is the dragonfly enthusiast, but I figured I would
share this link from the Canadian mint, in case he is interested. They
charge way more than bullion value, but the design is cool.

*http://tinyurl.com/abpu8ns
*
Best,

Andy*
*


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
